definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: After winning the lottery jackpot, he went from rags to riches overnight.
sentences.chinese: 贏了樂透頭彩後，他一夕之間從一貧如洗變成富翁。

sentences.english: What about those lucky few who do win a lottery jackpot?
sentences.chinese: 那些少數幸運贏得彩票頭彩獎金的人呢？

sentences.english: The jackpot can be yours if you pick the six winning numbers.
sentences.chinese: 要是你挑中了六個幸運號碼，頭彩就是你的了。

sentences.english: His life is even poorer than before he won the lottery.
sentences.chinese: 他的生活甚至比中頭彩之前還要貧困。

sentences.english: Want to experience the roulette game encounters the first prize?
sentences.chinese: 想要體驗頭彩冤家中的輪盤遊戲嗎？

sentences.english: That's why it feels like such a jackpot.
sentences.chinese: 這也是最吸引人的地方，那感覺就像中了頭彩一樣。

definition: to give a small demonstration of one's impressive skills (idiom)
to be a cinch/in the bag/(of a person) confident of success
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
(idiom) to lose one's head/to panic/to go to pieces
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
